code_info: Lot codes:  030122-50029  030222-50029 030822-50029 030922-50029 031122-50029  The code Interpretation:  030122 (MMDDYY): Date code of when fruit was picked. 50029: Cascade's internal code for ranch identifying number.  Load Shipment Numbers (Load shipment number is a sequential chronological order and is made up of the Product Lot Numbers.  Load Shipment Number indicates the Cascade as the importer, number of the container imported into USA and year):  CIM 125-22 CIM 129-22 CIM 130-22 CIM 144-22 CIM 146-22 CIM 147-22
